content.intro: We're excited to announce a complete redesign of our Get Started page, built specifically to help restaurant and cafe owners create their digital QR menu faster than ever. This update focuses on clearly communicating value, building trust through social proof, and providing a seamless signup experience that takes less than 5 minutes from start to finish.
content.image1Alt: New SobogdQR get started page with value propositions and social proof

content.section1Text: The new design prominently displays four key benefits that restaurant owners care about most: no technical skills required, instant menu updates, QR code and website included, and free to start. Each benefit is presented in a clean card format with intuitive icons, making it immediately clear what SobogdQR offers. This approach helps busy restaurant owners understand the value proposition within seconds of landing on the page.
content.section2Text: We've added a dynamic restaurant counter that shows how many businesses are already using SobogdQR. This counter updates automatically based on our growth rate, providing authentic social proof that helps new visitors feel confident in their decision to try our platform. Seeing that over 1,400 restaurants already trust SobogdQR significantly reduces hesitation and encourages signups.
content.section3Text: The entire signup process now happens on a single page with a consistent layout. Whether entering your email or verifying your code, the design remains the same - only the input field changes. This creates a smoother, less jarring experience. We've also added a visual process indicator showing the three simple steps: Sign up, Add menu, and Get QR. This transparency helps users understand exactly what to expect and reduces abandonment.

We understand that you're busy running your business, so we've made the signup process as quick and reassuring as possible. auth.description: We've launched a simple and secure email-based authentication system that lets you create your restaurant website and QR menu in minutes.

meta.title: User Authentication Interface - SobogdQR Changelog
meta.description: SobogdQR introduces a new passwordless authentication system for creating your restaurant website and digital QR menu quickly and securely

content.intro: We are excited to announce the launch of our new user authentication interface for SobogdQR. This update represents a significant step forward in making it easier than ever to create your restaurant website with a professional QR menu. Our goal has always been to help restaurant and cafe owners build their digital presence in minutes, not hours, and this new authentication system is designed with that mission in mind.
content.image1Alt: Email input step of SobogdQR authentication
content.image1Caption: Simple email-based authentication - no passwords to remember
content.section1Text: Understanding that restaurant owners are busy people, we've implemented a passwordless authentication system that requires only your email address. When you want to create your restaurant website or update your digital QR menu, simply enter your email and receive a secure 4-digit verification code. This approach eliminates the frustration of forgotten passwords while maintaining the highest security standards for your restaurant's data. The entire process takes less than 30 seconds, allowing you to focus on what matters most - running your restaurant and serving your customers.
content.section2Text: With our new authentication system, getting started with your digital QR menu has never been easier. Once authenticated, you'll have immediate access to our intuitive menu builder where you can add your dishes, set prices, upload photos, and organize categories. The QR menu you create will be accessible to your customers instantly - they simply scan the code and view your beautifully designed digital menu on their smartphone. No app downloads required for your customers, and no technical knowledge required from you. This is exactly what modern restaurants and cafes need to compete in today's digital-first world.
content.image2Alt: OTP verification step of SobogdQR authentication
content.image2Caption: Secure 4-digit code verification sent directly to your email
content.section3Text: Security was our top priority when designing this authentication system. Each verification code expires after 10 minutes and can only be used once, protecting your restaurant website and menu data from unauthorized access. At the same time, we've optimized every step of the process for speed. From entering your email to accessing your dashboard, the entire authentication flow completes in under a minute. This means you can make quick updates to your QR menu during service, add daily specials, or adjust prices - all without any delays.
content.benefit1: Create your restaurant website with QR menu in minutes - no technical skills required
content.benefit2: No passwords to remember - secure email-based verification keeps your account safe
content.benefit3: Instant access to your digital menu builder from any device
content.benefit4: Quick updates to your QR menu even during busy service hours
content.conclusionTitle: Start Building Your Digital Menu Today
content.conclusionText: This new authentication interface is just the beginning of our commitment to making digital QR menus accessible to every restaurant and cafe. Whether you're a small coffee shop or a growing restaurant chain, SobogdQR provides the tools you need to create a professional online presence. Your customers expect to find your menu online, and with our solution, you can exceed those expectations with a beautifully designed, always up-to-date digital QR menu that works perfectly on any smartphone.

questions.question: What is a QR menu for restaurant and how does it work?
questions.answer: A QR menu for restaurant is a digital menu that customers can access by scanning a QR code with their smartphone. SobogdQR creates a professional digital menu website for your restaurant or cafe that updates instantly without reprinting. Customers simply scan the code and view your menu on their device.

questions.question: How much does a QR menu cost for a restaurant or cafe?
questions.answer: SobogdQR offers flexible pricing starting from €0 forever with our free plan. This makes it affordable for any restaurant or cafe to create a professional QR menu. Paid plans start at just €4/month with additional features like unlimited items and advanced analytics.

questions.question: Can I create a website for my restaurant without coding?
questions.answer: Yes! SobogdQR is designed for restaurant and cafe owners without any technical knowledge. You can create a complete digital menu website for your restaurant in minutes, no programming or coding skills required. Simply add your dishes, prices, and photos through our intuitive interface.

questions.question: How often can I update my QR menu?
questions.answer: You can update your restaurant or cafe menu as often as you need. All changes are reflected in real-time, allowing you to instantly update prices, add new dishes, or change descriptions without reprinting physical menus. Perfect for daily specials and seasonal updates.

questions.question: Does the QR menu work for both restaurants and cafes?
questions.answer: Absolutely! SobogdQR is perfect for restaurants, cafes, coffee shops, bars, food trucks, and any food service business. Our digital menu solution adapts to any type of establishment, from small cafes to large restaurant chains.

questions.question: How does the automatic menu translation work?
questions.answer: Our QR menu system uses artificial intelligence to translate your restaurant or cafe menu into multiple languages automatically. This is perfect for tourist areas and international customers. You can offer your menu in English, Spanish, and other languages, helping you serve more customers.

questions.question: Can I try the QR menu solution for free?
questions.answer: Yes! We offer a completely free plan for restaurants and cafes to try SobogdQR. You can create your digital menu website with up to 15 items at no cost, forever. No credit card required to start. Upgrade only when you need more features.

questions.question: Is SobogdQR an app that customers need to download?
questions.answer: No! This is one of the best advantages. Customers don't need to download any app. They simply scan your QR code and the menu opens instantly in their web browser. This makes it much more convenient than restaurant apps that require downloads.

questions.question: What are the benefits of a digital menu website for my restaurant?
questions.answer: A digital menu website offers many benefits: instant menu updates without reprinting costs, multilingual support for international customers, contactless ordering for safety, analytics to see popular dishes, and professional presentation. Plus, it's eco-friendly as you eliminate paper menu waste.

questions.question: How do I create a QR code for my restaurant menu?
questions.answer: SobogdQR automatically generates a professional QR code when you create your digital menu. You can download and print this QR code for your restaurant tables, entrance, or takeout counter. The QR code is customizable and high-quality for clear scanning.
